actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow businesses a credit against income tax for providing work experiences for high school juniors and seniors for which the students receive credit toward graduation.
short_title: Student and Business Partnership for Credit Act of 1994

summary.text: Student and Business Partnership for Credit Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow businesses a credit for providing educational work experience for high school juniors and seniors.

titles.title: Student and Business Partnership for Credit Act of 1994

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow businesses a credit against income tax for providing work experiences for high school juniors and seniors for which the students receive credit toward graduation.
